name: Captain Gregg on the Planet Egg
name_original: Captain Gregg on the Planet Egg
description:
Captain Gregg is off on his most daring adventure yet! The brave little space explorer has landed on a planet that seems to shift and change under his feet. Help him reach the goal by rotating the planet beneath his space-sturdy hamster ball. The game is only finished when you are!

Controls: Use the mouse to navigate the UI, then use the left and right arrow keys to rotate the planet beneath Captain Gregg.

Font:

Karmatic Arcade by Vic Fieger: https://www.dafont.com/karmatic-arcade.font

Music:

Impact Prelude by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7565-impact-prelude

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Game built by Jeff in Godot engine in 9 hours on Friday the 13th.
